Articles.Content: I just had an idea about what if KSP was part of the workshop.

Should be in the suggestions, I understand you are new too. Welcome!

IIRC I think devs said no workshop for now.
NO workshop period. Why? Well the people who aren't on steam with KSP, (IE me) will not benifit with this decision

They're going to integrate the kerbal spaceport directly into the game at some point. So, while some people like myself might prefer having KSP more integrated into Steam and having Steam Workshop functionality, we're essentially going to get it in the end even without Steam. So yay~
As long as they make it auto-update installed mods, I don't care where it is.

Hello there

First of all: Please make sure that you post in the correct section. Suggestions belong into Suggestions and Development Discussion. That said, this is also on the What not to suggest? list that is stickied there:

Major features

  • Steam Workshop implementation

The items on this list have either been discussed to death or had a definitive decision made already. In this case, the decision that was made is that this is not planned. Please refer to the list and avoid making suggestions that are already on said list. Do also read the stickied threads aside from it.

FEichinger
